00055 #define SSL_VERIFY_PEER_STRICT (SSL_VERIFY_PEER | SSL_VERIFY_FAIL_IF_NO_PEER_CERT)
00056 
00057 typedef int (*PEM_PASSWD_CB)(char* buf, int size, int rwflag, void* password); // Password callback

00060 class USSLFtpClient;

00062 template <class T> class UClientImage;

00064 class U_EXPORT USSLSocket : public UTCPSocket {
00065 public:

00072         ~USSLSocket();

00074         // VARIE

00076         void setActive(bool flag)
00077                 {
00078                 U_TRACE(0, "USSLSocket::setActive(%b)", flag)
00079 
00080                 active = flag;
00081                 }

00083         bool secureConnection(int fd);
00084         bool acceptSSL(USSLSocket* pcConnection);

00092         bool useDHFile(const char* dh_file = 0);

00107         bool setContext(const char* cert_file,
00108                                                  const char* private_key_file, const char* passwd,
00109                                                  const char* CAfile, const char* CApath, int mode = SSL_VERIFY_PEER_STRICT | SSL_VERIFY_CLIENT_ONCE);
00110 
00119         void setVerifyDepth(int depth = 1)
00120                 {
00121                 U_TRACE(1, "USSLSocket::setVerifyDepth(%d)", depth)
00122 
00123                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(ctx)
00124 
00125                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(SSL_CTX_set_verify_depth, "%p,%d", ctx, depth);
00126                 }
00127 
00132         void setVerifyCallback(verify_cb func, int mode = SSL_VERIFY_PEER_STRICT | SSL_VERIFY_CLIENT_ONCE)
00133                 {
00134                 U_TRACE(1, "USSLSocket::setVerifyCallback(%p,%d)", func, mode)
00135 
00136                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(func)
00137 
00138                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(SSL_CTX_set_verify, "%p,%d,%p", ctx, mode, func);
00139                 }
00140 
00149         long getVerifyResult()
00150                 {
00151                 U_TRACE(1, "USSLSocket::getVerifyResult()")
00152 
00153                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(ssl)
00154 
00155                 long result = U_SYSCALL(SSL_get_verify_result, "%p", ssl);
00156 
00157                 U_DUMP("verify_status = %S", UServices::verify_status(result))
00158 
00159                 U_RETURN(result);
00160                 }
00161 
00167         X509* getPeerCertificate()
00168                 {
00169                 U_TRACE(1, "USSLSocket::getPeerCertificate()")
00170 
00171                 X509* peer = (X509*) (ssl ? U_SYSCALL(SSL_get_peer_certificate, "%p", ssl) : 0);
00172 
00173                 U_RETURN_POINTER(peer, X509);
00174                 }
00175 
00180         bool askForClientCertificate();

00185                 {
00186                 U_TRACE(0, "USSLSocket::isSSL()")
00187 
00188                 U_RETURN(true);
00189                 }
00190 
00191         virtual void closesocket();

00193         virtual int send(const void* pData,   int iDataLen);

00203         virtual bool connectServer(const UString& server, int iServPort)
00204                 {
00205                 U_TRACE(0, "USSLSocket::connectServer(%.*S,%d)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(server), iServPort)
00206 
00207                 if (UTCPSocket::connectServer(server, iServPort) &&
00208                          (active ? secureConnection(USocket::iSockDesc) : true))
00209                         {
00210                         U_RETURN(true);
00211                         }
00212 
00213                 U_RETURN(false);
00214                 }
00215 
00222         virtual bool acceptClient(USocket* pcNewConnection)
00223                 {
00224                 U_TRACE(0, "USSLSocket::acceptClient(%p)", pcNewConnection)
00225 
00226                 if (USocket::acceptClient(pcNewConnection) &&
00227                          active                                                                                  &&
00228                          acceptSSL((USSLSocket*)pcNewConnection))
00229                         {
00230                         U_RETURN(true);
00231                         }
00232 
00233                 U_RETURN(false);
00234                 }
00235

00237         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00238 #endif

00243         int ret;
00244         bool active;
00245 
00246         static const char* status(SSL* ssl, int ret, bool flag, char* buffer, uint32_t buffer_size);
00247 
00248                          const char* status(bool flag) const { return status(ssl, ret, flag, 0, 0); }
00249 
00250 private:
00251         USSLSocket(const USSLSocket&) : UTCPSocket(false) {}
00252         USSLSocket& operator=(const USSLSocket&)                          { return *this; }
